20101208181458.500|20101208181501.000|CCO|AMERICAN BOWE BERGDAHL.
20101208181501.000|20101208181503.500|CCO|HE WAS CAPTURED IN JUNE OF LAST 
20101208181503.500|20101208181506.000|CCO|YEAR AFTER DISAPPEARING FROM HIS
20101208181506.000|20101208181508.500|CCO|COMBAT OUTPOST IN PAKTIKA 
20101208181508.500|20101208181511.000|CCO|PROVINCE.
20101208181511.000|20101208181512.250|CCO|A FAMILY SPOKESMAN CONFIRMED THE
20101208181512.250|20101208181513.500|CCO|YOUNG MAN IN THE VIDEO IS THEIR 
20101208181513.500|20101208181514.750|CCO|SON.
20101208181514.750|20101208181516.000|CCO|THE TALIBAN PREVIOUSLY RELEASED 
20101208181516.000|20101208181517.250|CCO|A VIDEO OF BERGDAHL BACK IN 
20101208181517.250|20101208181518.500|CCO|APRIL.
20101208181518.500|20101208181519.750|CCO|CNN'S NIC ROBERTSON JOINS US

20101208181522.667|20101208181524.333|CCO|NIC, WHAT DO WE KNOW ABOUT THIS?

20101208181544.333|20101208181546.000|CCO|THERE'S ALMOST A CUT ON THE SIDE

20101208181547.667|20101208181549.333|CCO|BEEN HIT OR ROUGHLY SHAVE.

20101208182029.333|20101208182031.000|CCO|SERIES OF WALLETS TO HELP YOU

20101208182034.333|20101208182036.000|CCO|"YOUR MONEY" IN NEW YORK JOINS 
20101208182036.000|20101208182037.667|CCO|ME.

20101208182039.333|20101208182041.000|CCO|SOME BIG SORT OF POLITICAL 
20101208182041.000|20101208182042.250|CCO|DISCUSSION TO HAVE.
20101208182042.250|20101208182043.500|CCO|THIS ONE'S QUITE SIMPLE.

20101208182044.750|20101208182046.000|CCO|>> IT'S COME TO THIS.

20101208182049.750|20101208182051.000|CCO|MONEY IN IT.

20101208182053.000|20101208182055.000|CCO|YOU VERY LOUDLY WHEN YOU'RE

20101208182057.000|20101208182059.000|CCO|TO REMIND YOU, OH, YES, BY THE 
20101208182059.000|20101208182101.000|CCO|WAY, THERE MIGHT NOT BE A LOT OF
20101208182101.000|20101208182103.500|CCO|MONEY IN THE BANK.
20101208182103.500|20101208182106.000|CCO|LET ME TELL YOU WHAT THE M.I.T. 
20101208182106.000|20101208182108.500|CCO|SCIENTISTS HAVE COME UP WITH.
20101208182108.500|20101208182111.000|CCO|IT'S CALLED TANGIBLE INTERFACE 
20101208182111.000|20101208182113.000|CCO|FOR AWARENESS.
20101208182113.000|20101208182115.000|CCO|THAT'S TALK THEY USE.
20101208182115.000|20101208182117.000|CCO|BECAUSE MONEY IS DIGITAL, WE 
20101208182117.000|20101208182119.000|CCO|CAN'T FEEL OR VISUALIZE IT 
20101208182119.000|20101208182121.000|CCO|ANYMORE.
20101208182121.000|20101208182123.000|CCO|SO WE NEED HAPTIC AWARENESS TO 
20101208182123.000|20101208182125.000|CCO|EXPLAIN IT TO US.
20101208182125.000|20101208182127.000|CCO|THIS IS THE BUMBLEBEE WALLET.
